function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Limited data accuracy or completeness in the epidemiological data and npi timelines from the ministry of health and other sources.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Incomplete or delayed implementation of npis in specific regions of saudi arabia.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of public compliance with npis such as isolation, testing, and school closures.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited research on sars-cov-2 dynamics in gulf states and saudi arabia","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Limited studies on non-pharmaceutical intervention npi effectiveness in gulf states","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Exclusion of gulf states in some global npi effectiveness studies","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Community transmission of sars-cov-2","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Imported covid-19 cases","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Suspension of religious pilgrimage and closure of public venues","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of assessment for water usage and its impact on health in building evaluation tool","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increase in energy efficiency may lead to changes in building automation and control systems, affecting the propagation of contagious diseases.","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Increase in energy efficiency leading to a reduction in energy consumption","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited energy efficiency improvement package targeting specific domains such as domestic hot water and heating","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased flexibility and storage in the building","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential for increased occupant exposure to contagious diseases due to retrofitting and increased maintenance activities.","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate control patterns for domestic hot water systems may lead to the proliferation of legionella bacteria.","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increase in energy efficiency score may lead to changes in building systems and practices that can affect indoor air quality.","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Changes in control of distribution pumps and heat generators for energy efficiency may affect the thermal comfort of building occupants.","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limiting changes to certain building systems due to constraints may result in uneven distribution of energy efficiency improvements, leading to potential performance and health disparities within the building.","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Increase in comfort level may lead to higher occupancy and greater spread of contagious diseases.","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Introduction of demand-based control and automated functions may lead to an increase in aerosol transmission of contagious diseases.","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Improved information to occupants may lead to increased social interaction and closer proximity, increasing the risk of disease transmission.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Introduction of new control measures and technology","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Increase in energy efficiency and hvac control","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Improvements in overall comfort and building performance","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Poor ventilaton system","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Low indoor comfort and air quality","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate control over heat supply and distribution","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Strict requirements regarding legionella bacteria","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High cost of upgrading the building for dynamic envelope improvement","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate control regarding heat supply and fluid temperature","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Poor ventilation and cooling in high-density urban area may increase the risk of airborne disease transmission.","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate flexibility and storage options may limit the adaptation of building systems to future disease prevention measures.","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limitations on the implementation of renewable energy sources may hinder sustainable and resilient building operations during disease outbreaks.","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Low-performing technical domains in the three case study buildings","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Implementation of system capabilities and units in the near future","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate ventilation and cooling systems","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate control and automation capabilities in bacs may lead to inefficiencies in the management of contagious diseases propagation.","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Low energy efficiency in bacs may result in increased energy consumption and compromised indoor air quality, impacting public health and disease transmission.","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate lighting control in bacs may lead to discomfort, decreased productivity, and compromised health of building occupants, impacting their susceptibility to contagious diseases.","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate reporting system for heating, cooling, and ventilation domains.","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Low percentage of sub-metering for loads.","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of fault detection and diagnostics platform.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Low-scoring technical domains in bacs","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Legislative limitations affecting bacs improvements","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Health care facility comfort improvements in bacs","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Ventilation domain scoring high in energy efficiency, maintenance, and comfort, increasing air circulation and potential disease transmission","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Low scoring in flexibility and storage, impacting the ability to adapt spaces for disease prevention measures","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"High scores for lighting and electricity domains, impacting energy efficiency and potential to reduce disease transmission","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Low scores in dynamic envelope, domestic hot water, and heating domains","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium"}]}
